code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Fibonacci(){const[n,setN]=useState(0);const[sequence,setSequence]=useState([]);const handleInputChange=event=>{setN(parseInt(event.target.value,10));};const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();if(n<=0){alert("Inserisci un numero positivo");return;}let output=[0,1];if(n===1){setSequence([0]);}else if(n===2){setSequence(output);}else{for(let i=2;i<n;i++){output.push(output[output.length-1]+output[output.length-2]);}setSequence(output);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Quanti numeri della sequenza devo stampare?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"INPUT",value:n,onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Calcola"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{color:'black'},children:sequence.join(", ")})]});}export default Fibonacci;
